parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

parameters.name: ImportTaskIds
parameters.description: A list of import snapshot task IDs. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ImportSnapshotTasks
nested_items.description: A list of zero or more import snapshot tasks that are currently active or were completed or canceled in the previous 7 days.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the import snapshot task.

nested_items.name: ImportTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the import snapshot task.

nested_items.name: SnapshotTaskDetail
nested_items.description: Describes an import snapshot task.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the disk image being imported.

nested_items.name: DiskImageSize
nested_items.description: The size of the disk in the snapshot, in GiB.

nested_items.name: Encrypted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the snapshot is encrypted.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The format of the disk image from which the snapshot is created.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the KMS key that was used to create the encrypted snapshot.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: The percentage of completion for the import snapshot task.

nested_items.name: SnapshotId
nested_items.description: The snapshot ID of the disk being imported.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A brief status for the import snapshot task.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed status message for the import snapshot task.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL of the disk image from which the snapshot is created.

nested_items.name: UserBucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket for the disk image.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket from which the disk image was created.

nested_items.name: S3Key
nested_items.description: The file name of the disk image.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags for the import snapshot task.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to get the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
